title: Expecting the IMAGE detail page to contain a populated fact sheet
gherkin:
When the user visits the detail page of a "IMAGE"
Then the page should display a fact sheet
And the fact sheet should display an entry for each of the following properties
  | _property_         |
  | external_id        | 
  | image_provider     |
  | name               |
  | description        |
  | creator            |
  | license            |
  | tags               |
  | source             |
  | image_url_original |
  | image_url_xxl      |
  | image_url_xl       |
  | image_url_l        |
  | image_url_m        |
  | image_url_s        |
  | image_url_xs       |
